Not bad for a Norwegian production, but it did come short at some aspects. The sceneries could be coupled smoother together. You just don't go to a disco scene without following a person or to shoot one of the lead acthors, just as an example. Smell a bit like a hasty after production; lack of that last mill to put it well together. Let's hope second  season get rid of these errors. 
Maybe the humor is too local as well at some places. Worth watching though.

A 2-disc edition is available at cdon dot com, both DVD and Blu-Ray, with professional subtitles in English and Norwegian. The series was not dubbed, but made with dual-language dialogue. The main character appeared to understand everything said in Norwegian, but he himself spoke English, as did the other English actors.
